title: Steve Brodsky from Cave In/Mutoid Man
itunes:title: Steve Brodsky from Cave In/Mutoid Man
description:
I had the great pleasure of meeting up with Steve Brodsky one afternoon over coffee to discuss his life and musical outlets. It was a dream of mine to pick his brain about many things including his street performer days, the "style" of metal heads and productivity. It was a very compelling chat that brought to light many things I didn't know about him and I hope you enjoy! Brought to you in conjunction with Propertyofzack.com

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
